actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill for the relief of unemployment through the performance of useful public work.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to provide public service employment for unemployed United States citizens in reforestation, fire prevention, pest control, and other conservation projects on public lands, including national park and national forest improvement projects. Authorizes the appropriation of $3,000,000,000 for fiscal years 1978 and 1979 to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of unemployment through the performance of useful public work.
